metadata.title: CVE-2024-42010 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mod_css_styles in Roundcube through 1.5.7 and 1.6.x through 1.6.7insufficiently filters Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequences inrendered e-mail messages, allowing a remote attacker to obtain sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
